          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas particles in a box</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gaspartikel in einem Kasten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Particules de gaz dans un cadre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partículas do gás em uma caixa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particelle del gas in una casella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο μόρια σε ένα κιβώτιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partículas del gas en un rectángulo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the same amount of gas particles inside a big box (left) and a smaller box (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die gleiche Menge der 
Gaspartikel innerhalb eines grossen Kastens (nach links) und eines 
Kästchens (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la même quantité de 
particules de gaz à l'intérieur d'un grand cadre (à gauche) et 
d'une plus petite case (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a mesma quantidade de
partículas do gás dentro de uma caixa grande (à esquerda) e de uma 
caixa menor (direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano la stessa quantità
di particelle del gas all'interno di una casella grande (a sinistra) e
di più piccola casella (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν ίδιο ποσό αέριο
μορίων μέσα σε ένα μεγάλο κιβώτιο (αριστερά) και ένα μικρότερο
κιβώτιο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran la misma cantidad de
partículas del gas dentro de un rectángulo grande (a la izquierda) y
de un rectángulo más pequeño (derecho).</string>
          </description>
